38 // Class ProfileNode
42 class ProfileNode {
43 
44  private :
45 
46  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
47 
49  const char* mName;
50 
52  uint mNbTotalCalls;
53 
55  long double mStartingTime;
56 
58  long double mTotalTime;
59 
61  int mRecursionCounter;
62 
64  ProfileNode* mParentNode;
65 
67  ProfileNode* mChildNode;
68 
70  ProfileNode* mSiblingNode;
71 
72  public :
73 
74  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
75 
77  ProfileNode(const char* name, ProfileNode* parentNode);
78 
80  ~ProfileNode();
81 
83  ProfileNode* findSubNode(const char* name);
84 
86  ProfileNode* getParentNode();
87 
89  ProfileNode* getSiblingNode();
90 
92  ProfileNode* getChildNode();
93 
95  const char* getName();
96 
98  uint getNbTotalCalls() const;
99 
101  long double getTotalTime() const;
102 
104  void enterBlockOfCode();
105 
107  bool exitBlockOfCode();
108 
110  void reset();
111 
113  void destroy();
114 };

176 // Class Profiler
181 class Profiler {
182 
183  public:
184 
186  enum class Format {Text};
187 
189  class Destination {
190 
191  public:
192 
194  Format format;
195 
197  Destination(Format logFormat) : format(logFormat) {
198 
199  }
200 
202  virtual ~Destination() {
203 
204  }
205 
207  virtual std::ostream& getOutputStream() = 0;
208  };
209 
211  class FileDestination : public Destination {
212 
213  private:
214 
215  std::string mFilePath;
216 
218  std::ofstream mFileStream;
219 
220  public:
221 
223  FileDestination(const std::string& filePath, Format format)
224  :Destination(format), mFilePath(filePath),
225  mFileStream(filePath, std::ios::binary) {
226 
227  if(!mFileStream.is_open()) {
228  throw(std::runtime_error("ReactPhysics3D Logger: Unable to open an output stream to file " + mFilePath));
229  }
230  }
231 
233  virtual ~FileDestination() override {
234 
235  if (mFileStream.is_open()) {
236 
237  // Close the stream
238  mFileStream.close();
239  }
240  }
241 
243  virtual std::ostream& getOutputStream() override {
244  return mFileStream;
245  }
246  };
247 
249  class StreamDestination : public Destination {
250 
251  private:
252 
254  std::ostream& mOutputStream;
255 
256  public:
257 
259  StreamDestination(std::ostream& outputStream, Format format)
260  :Destination(format), mOutputStream(outputStream) {
261 
262  }
263 
265  virtual ~StreamDestination() override {
266 
267  }
268 
270  virtual std::ostream& getOutputStream() override {
271  return mOutputStream;
272  }
273  };
274 
275  private :
276 
277  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
278 
280  ProfileNode mRootNode;
281 
283  ProfileNode* mCurrentNode;
284 
286  uint mFrameCounter;
287 
289  long double mProfilingStartTime;
290 
292  List<Destination*> mDestinations;
293 
295  void printRecursiveNodeReport(ProfileNodeIterator* iterator, int spacing,
296  std::ostream &outputStream);
297 
299  void destroyIterator(ProfileNodeIterator* iterator);
300 
302  void destroy();
303 
304  public :
305 
306  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
307 
309  Profiler();
310 
312  ~Profiler();
313 
315  void startProfilingBlock(const char *name);
316 
319  void stopProfilingBlock();
320 
322  void reset();
323 
325  uint getNbFrames();
326 
328  long double getElapsedTimeSinceStart();
329 
331  void incrementFrameCounter();
332 
334  ProfileNodeIterator* getIterator();
335 
336  // Add a file destination to the profiler
337  void addFileDestination(const std::string& filePath, Format format);
338 
339  // Add a stream destination to the profiler
340  void addStreamDestination(std::ostream& outputStream, Format format);
341 
343  void removeAllDestinations();
344 
346  void printReport();
347 };
348 
349 // Class ProfileSample
355 class ProfileSample {
356 
357  private:
358 
359  Profiler* mProfiler;
360 
361  public :
362 
363  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
364 
366  ProfileSample(const char* name, Profiler* profiler) :mProfiler(profiler) {
367 
368  assert(profiler != nullptr);
369 
370  // Ask the profiler to start profiling a block of code
371  mProfiler->startProfilingBlock(name);
372  }
373 
375  ~ProfileSample() {
376 
377  // Tell the profiler to stop profiling a block of code
378  mProfiler->stopProfilingBlock();
379  }
380 };
381 
382 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
383 
384 // Use this macro to start profile a block of code
385 #define RP3D_PROFILE(name, profiler) ProfileSample profileSample(name, profiler)
386 
387 #else // If profile is not active
388 
389 // Empty macro in case profiling is not active
390 #define RP3D_PROFILE(name, profiler)
391 
392 #endif
393 
394 // Return true if we are at the root of the profiler tree
395 inline bool ProfileNodeIterator::isRoot() {
396  return (mCurrentParentNode->getParentNode() == nullptr);
397 }
398 
399 // Return true if we are at the end of a branch of the profiler tree
400 inline bool ProfileNodeIterator::isEnd() {
401  return (mCurrentChildNode == nullptr);
402 }
403 
404 // Return the name of the current node
405 inline const char* ProfileNodeIterator::getCurrentName() {
406  return mCurrentChildNode->getName();
407 }
408 
409 // Return the total time of the current node
410 inline long double ProfileNodeIterator::getCurrentTotalTime() {
411  return mCurrentChildNode->getTotalTime();
412 }
413 
414 // Return the total number of calls of the current node
415 inline uint ProfileNodeIterator::getCurrentNbTotalCalls() {
416  return mCurrentChildNode->getNbTotalCalls();
417 }
418 
419 // Return the name of the current parent node
420 inline const char* ProfileNodeIterator::getCurrentParentName() {
421  return mCurrentParentNode->getName();
422 }
423 
424 // Return the total time of the current parent node
425 inline long double ProfileNodeIterator::getCurrentParentTotalTime() {
426  return mCurrentParentNode->getTotalTime();
427 }
428 
429 // Return the total number of calls of the current parent node
430 inline uint ProfileNodeIterator::getCurrentParentNbTotalCalls() {
431  return mCurrentParentNode->getNbTotalCalls();
432 }
433 
434 // Go to the first node
435 inline void ProfileNodeIterator::first() {
436  mCurrentChildNode = mCurrentParentNode->getChildNode();
437 }
438 
439 // Go to the next node
440 inline void ProfileNodeIterator::next() {
441  mCurrentChildNode = mCurrentChildNode->getSiblingNode();
442 }
443 
444 // Return a pointer to the parent node
445 inline ProfileNode* ProfileNode::getParentNode() {
446  return mParentNode;
447 }
448 
449 // Return a pointer to a sibling node
450 inline ProfileNode* ProfileNode::getSiblingNode() {
451  return mSiblingNode;
452 }
453 
454 // Return a pointer to a child node
455 inline ProfileNode* ProfileNode::getChildNode() {
456  return mChildNode;
457 }
458 
459 // Return the name of the node
460 inline const char* ProfileNode::getName() {
461  return mName;
462 }
463 
464 // Return the total number of call of the corresponding block of code
465 inline uint ProfileNode::getNbTotalCalls() const {
466  return mNbTotalCalls;
467 }
468 
469 // Return the total time spent in the block of code
470 inline long double ProfileNode::getTotalTime() const {
471  return mTotalTime;
472 }
473 
474 // Return the number of frames
475 inline uint Profiler::getNbFrames() {
476  return mFrameCounter;
477 }
478 
479 // Return the elasped time since the start/reset of the profiling
480 inline long double Profiler::getElapsedTimeSinceStart() {
481  long double currentTime = Timer::getCurrentSystemTime() * 1000.0L;
482  return currentTime - mProfilingStartTime;
483 }
484 
485 // Increment the frame counter
486 inline void Profiler::incrementFrameCounter() {
487  mFrameCounter++;
488 }
489 
490 // Return an iterator over the profiler tree starting at the root
491 inline ProfileNodeIterator* Profiler::getIterator() {
492  return new ProfileNodeIterator(&mRootNode);
493 }
494 
495 // Destroy a previously allocated iterator
496 inline void Profiler::destroyIterator(ProfileNodeIterator* iterator) {
497  delete iterator;
498 }
499 
500 // Destroy the profiler (release the memory)
501 inline void Profiler::destroy() {
502  mRootNode.destroy();
503 }
504 
505 }
506 
507 
508 #endif
